text: Ron Cephas Jones (January 8, 1957 â€“ August 19, 2023), sometimes credited as Ron C. Jones, was an American actor. His movie roles include He Got Game (1998), Sweet and Lowdown (1999), Half Nelson (2006), and Across The Universe (2007). Jones performed stage roles with the Steppenwolf Theatre Company in Chicago, Illinois. He starred on the NBC dramedy series This Is Us as William Hill.
